articles.title: NASA Unveils Plans for Lunar Habitat by 2030
articles.author: Elena Rodriguez
articles.summary: NASA has announced its ambitious goal to establish a permanent human habitat on the Moon by the end of the decade.
articles.content: The Artemis program will lead the effort, with international collaboration and private sector support. The habitat will support scientific research, resource extraction, and serve as a launchpad for future Mars missions.

articles.title: Indiaâ€™s Monsoon Rains Boost Crop Yields in Bihar
articles.author: Ravi Kumar
articles.summary: Farmers in Bihar are reporting higher-than-average yields thanks to consistent monsoon rainfall this season.
articles.content: The Agriculture Ministry noted a 12% increase in rice and maize production compared to last year. Experts attribute the success to improved irrigation and weather forecasting tools.

articles.title: Bollywood Star Rhea Kapoor Announces Directorial Debut
articles.author: Anjali Desai
articles.summary: Producer Rhea Kapoor is stepping behind the camera for her first film as director, set to release in early 2026.
articles.content: The film, titled *Midnight Mangoes*, is a coming-of-age drama set in Goa. Kapoor says the story is inspired by her own childhood summers and will feature a mix of new and veteran actors.

articles.title: Breakthrough in Cancer Research: AI Identifies New Treatment Pathways
articles.author: Dr. Marcus Lee
articles.summary: Researchers at Stanford University have used AI to uncover previously unknown protein interactions that could lead to new cancer therapies.
articles.content: The study, published in *Nature Medicine*, demonstrates how machine learning models can predict drug responses with high accuracy. Clinical trials are expected to begin in early 2026.
